game.title: The Missing Shipment
game.objective: Find the missing shipment of magical artifacts and return them to the Wizard's Council.
game.description: A shipment of magical artifacts was stolen from a merchant's wagon on its way to the Wizard's Council. The Council has sent out a call for adventurers to help locate and retrieve the missing shipment.
game.reward: A powerful magical artifact and a large sum of gold.

task.objective: Travel to the town of Redleaf and speak to the merchant who was robbed.
task.description: The merchant, Elara, can provide more information about the shipment and the circumstances of the robbery.
